Details.Name: sc_cashback_details
Details.Feature: 10% cash rebate with purchases above $5,000 at Robinsons, Marks & Spencer and John Little

5% cash rebate for purchases below $5,000 at participating 19 retail brands including Robinsons, Marks & Spencer, John Little, Royal Sporting House, Golfhouse, Lacoste, Nautical, Speedo, Vans and Quiksilver

Details.Name: sc_rewards_details
Details.Feature: $2 = 1 Robs$ (outside Robinsons Group of stores), S$2 spent overseas = 3 Robs
$200 Robs$ = S$1 off, 4,800 Robs$ = S$30 offReceive a 25% Robinsons bonus discount letter with min. spend $500 at Robinsons, Marks & Spencer and/or John Little

Details.Name: sc_shopping_details
Details.Feature: 10% cash rebate with purchases above $5,000 at Robinsons, Marks & Spencer and John Little

5% cash rebate for purchases below $5,000 at participating 19 retail brands including Robinsons, Marks & Spencer, John Little, Royal Sporting House, Golfhouse, Lacoste, Nautical, Speedo, Vans and Quiksilver
Receive a 25% Robinsons bonus discount letter with min. spend $500 at Robinsons, Marks & Spencer and/or John Little
